HexDirection
public enum HexDirection

The edges of a hexagon.

NE

Northeast

E

East

SE

Southeast

SW

Southwest

W

West

NW

Northwest

HexDirectionExtensions
public static
HexDirectionExtensions

This static class provides a service to find the opposite direction when passed a given direction.
